# lyne-accordion-item


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property               | Attribute       | Description                                           | Type                                     | Default     |
| ---------------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `first`                | `first`         | Set this attribute for the first item in an accordion | `boolean`                                | `undefined` |
| `heading` _(required)_ | `heading`       | Text to show as title for the accordion               | `string`                                 | `undefined` |
| `headingLevel`         | `heading-level` | Heading level                                         | `"1" \| "2" \| "3" \| "4" \| "5" \| "6"` | `'1'`       |
| `last`                 | `last`          | Set this attribute for the last item in an accordion  | `boolean`                                | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot        | Description                                               |
| ----------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"content"` | Pass html-content to show as the content of the accordion |
| `"icon"`    | Pass an svg to display an icon left to the title          |


----------------------------------------------
